tickets.subject: Login critical issue affecting all users
tickets.description: Critical issue: The login system is completely down. No users can authenticate. This is affecting 100% of our user base. Production is down and needs immediate attention.

tickets.subject: API endpoint returning 500 errors
tickets.description: The GET /api/tickets endpoint is returning HTTP 500 errors intermittently. The error logs show database connection pool exhaustion.

tickets.subject: Invoice generation stopped working
tickets.description: Invoices are no longer being generated for new orders. The invoice service appears to be down or misconfigured.

tickets.subject: Double charging customers on checkout
tickets.description: Customers are reporting duplicate charges when completing checkout. This is a critical billing issue that needs immediate investigation.

tickets.subject: Add role-based access control
tickets.description: We need the ability to define custom roles with granular permissions for better security management.

tickets.subject: Cannot reset password
tickets.description: The password reset flow is broken. I click reset but never receive the email link. It's been 24 hours.

tickets.subject: Defect: Search returns incorrect results
tickets.description: Steps to reproduce: 1) Enter search term 'test' 2) Results show unrelated items 3) Results are from incorrect date range

tickets.subject: Implementation of real-time notifications
tickets.description: Users need real-time notifications instead of polling. This would improve user experience significantly.

tickets.subject: Scheduled maintenance window notification missing
tickets.description: No email notification was sent before the scheduled maintenance window. Users were surprised when the system went down.

tickets.subject: Database query performance degradation
tickets.description: Queries that used to execute in milliseconds now take seconds. Performance has degraded over the last week.

tickets.subject: Tax calculation is incorrect
tickets.description: The tax calculation in invoices is using wrong rates. Some customers are being overcharged on taxes.

tickets.subject: SSL/TLS certificate renewal urgent
tickets.description: Current SSL certificate expires in 5 days. This is critical for maintaining secure HTTPS connections.

tickets.subject: Improve accessibility for screen readers
tickets.description: Current UI has accessibility issues. ARIA labels are missing and keyboard navigation needs improvement.

tickets.subject: Export reports in multiple formats
tickets.description: We need ability to export reports as PDF, Excel, and CSV with formatting preserved.

tickets.subject: Docker image build fails
tickets.description: Docker image build is failing during CI/CD pipeline. Build logs show dependency resolution errors.

tickets.subject: iOS app crashes on iOS 14
tickets.description: The app crashes immediately on launch when running iOS 14. Works fine on iOS 13.

tickets.subject: Integrate with external payment gateway
tickets.description: We need to integrate with Stripe for international payment processing.

tickets.subject: GDPR compliance audit needed
tickets.description: We need to conduct a full audit to ensure GDPR compliance for user data handling.

tickets.subject: API documentation is outdated
tickets.description: The API documentation does not match current endpoints. Many examples are incorrect or deprecated.

tickets.subject: Request for custom theme support
tickets.description: It would be nice to have the ability to create custom themes with company branding.
